system.description:
Ghosts that used to be women that have died during childbirth, come to haunt villages by walking under their houses. They scramble across the earth quickly and erratically.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Rending Claws. Attack an adjacent enemy with Bravery, then bleed the target.

Gambits [[/r d8]]

1-2: Rush > Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence

3-4: Rush > Inflict Violence > Razor Tongue [1]: Inflict 1 Hit on any 1 enemy that is bleeding, then heal 1.

5-6: Unhinge Jaw [1]: Become immune to forced movement until the end of the Patianak's next riff, and then add +1d on the Patianak's next attack > Rush > Inflict Violence

7-8: Inflict Violence > Razor Ghost [2]: Fly 5, then attack an adjacent enemy with Bravery (+Faith if the target is bleeding). Repeat this effect, ignoring Combo Breaker.

traits.name: Walking Dead
traits.description: When Dead fall to 0 HP, they become a pile of grudge. However, they still Riff: at the start of their Riff, they have a 33% chance of reforming and heal 2 HP, and they can riff again. Piles of grudges can be exorcised by spending 1 Beat while close to them. Once Exorcised, they are removed from play. Any Dead that falls to 0 HP by fire or burning holy radiance are immediately exorcised.

traits.name: Earthen Body
traits.description: All Dead are immune to poison, bleed, and chill.

traits.name: Clattering Ghost
traits.description: After an attack, fly 2. Patianak cannot be slowed.
